thing-type.label: Ring Account Binding Thing
thing-type.description: Account with ring.com to access the devices.

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: The Ring account's user name
parameter.description: Enter the user name you used to subscribe to the Ring services. If using 2 factor authentication, leave this blank and enter the refresh token instead.

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: The Ring account's password
parameter.description: Enter the password you used to subscribe to the Ring services. If using 2 factor authentication, leave this blank and enter the refresh token instead.

parameter.name: refreshToken
parameter.label: The Ring account's refresh token
parameter.description: Enter the refresh token from Ring. Use this instead of username/password when using 2 factor authentication, or if you don't wish to save the username and password in OpenHAB

parameter.name: hardwareId
parameter.label: A unique hardware id
parameter.description: Enter a hardware id that is unique for all your devices connected to Ring (e.g. computer's MAC address)

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: The refresh interval
parameter.description: How often to poll the Ring service for events in seconds
